contentrichtext.text: {{About|the Brazilian county|the 1989 short film|Isle of Flowers}} {{Coord|10|26|09|S|36|32|24|W|scale:30000|display=title}} '''Ilha das Flores''' is a municipality/county in the state of [[Sergipe]](SE) in [[Brazil]]. Its population was 9,005 (2005) and its area is 53 kmÂ².<ref>[[Brazilian Institute of Geography and Statistics|IBGE]] - [http://www.ibge.gov.br/cidadesat/default.php]</ref> The elevation is 3 m.'''Ilha das Flores''' is also a Brazilian movie from December 1988, by Jorge Furtado. ==References== {{Reflist}} [[Category:Populated places in Sergipe]] {{Sergipe-geo-stub}}
